title: TXT drop comeback MV Run Away as they release first studio album
text:
TXT have dropped their first ever comeback MV, and we are totally into it.

The music video for new single Run Away has been released, and it sees Yeonjun, Beomgyu, Taehyun, Soobin and Hueningkai in a school setting and stealing out hearts.

The ambitious and whimsical video sees the boys setting fire to the pages of a book and jumping into a swimming pool, before finding a secret garden beneath a trap door.

Then there’s a pair of special glasses that give the idols access to an alternate universe – of course.

TXT are back (Picture: Big Hit)

The video features numerous energetic and slick dance routines – showing us the boys are back and better than ever.

After Run Away dropped, #RunAwayWithTXT began trending, so it was clear Tomorrow x Together stans were pretty excited.

The video drop comes the same day of TXT’s first studio album, The Dream Chapter: MAGIC.

The new album is ‘the second story of the boys chasing their dreams’, following their first EP The Dream Chapter: STAR, which made TXT the fastest K-pop boyband to chart their debut record in the US.

The Big Hit band’s comeback was delayed after Soobin, Taehyun and Hueningkai all came down with conjunctivitis.
